name.ch: 比較刑事訴訟法與法治專題研究

notice.ch: 大學部以發密碼卡為限

department.ch: 法律與政府研究所碩士班

remark.ch: 大學部以發密碼卡為限

goal.ch: 本課程將探討當今刑事訴訟新趨勢，比較美國與台灣之刑事政策之差異，包括檢察官轉向制度、緩起訴制度、量刑制度(包含程序)、新增訂訴訟被害人參加制度及修復性司法，比較分析美國與我國上述刑事訴訟制度之架構與重點。此外，並深入探討死刑及憲法法庭判決相關議題。
goal.en:
“This seminar explores the modern criminal trial 
system of major modern countries, the differences between, and the ideologies of, different legal 
systems, all of which influence the design of the 
criminal trials in any country.  Furthermore, the 
seminar compares and contrasts the procedural 
differences, and the sentencing of the judicial 
decisions among the United States, and the 
Taiwanese legislation“

outline.ch:
“本課程目的在於研究當今先進國家之刑事轉向制度，緩起訴制度、量刑制度、訴訟被害人參加訴訟制度及修復性司法等，藉以認識比較刑事訴訟制度之基礎架構、制度設計及運作。
內容綱要： (含教學進度)
第一單元　  緒論
第二單元     訟訴制度之差異及美國刑事訴訟
第三單元　 檢察官偵查終結之決定權
及裁量權(起訴裁量權)
第四單元    量刑制度
第五單元    訴訟被害人參加訴訟制度
outline.en:
“This seminar explores the modern criminal trial
system of major modern countries, the differences between, and the ideologies of, different legal
systems, all of which influence the design of the
criminal trials in any country.  Furthermore, the
seminar compares and contrasts the procedural
differences, and the sentencing of the judicial
decisions among the United States, and the
Taiwanese legislation“

textbook.ch:
“參考書目
林鈺雄，《刑事訴訟法上冊總論編》《刑事訴訟法下冊各論編》，台北：新學林。
王兆鵬、李榮耕等三人合著，《刑事訴訟法上冊》《刑事訴訟法下冊》，台北：新學林。
黃朝義，《刑事訴訟法》，台北：新學林。
李佳玟，《程序正義之鋼索》。


指定之專論文章，上課另行指定。“
textbook.en:
“Reference books : 

Wayne R. Lafave et al., Criminal Procedure, 5th ed (2009).

Ronald Jay Allen, William J. Stuntz, Joseph L. Hoffmann, Debra A.  Livingston, and Andrew D. Leipold, Comprehensive Criminal Procedure, 3rd ed. (2016). 
  
Jacqueline E. Ross ＆ Stephen C. Thaman ed., Comparative Criminal Procedure, Elgar Publishing (2016). 

Steven Vago, Law and Society, 9th ed. Pearson ( 2009). 

Lawrence M. Friedman, A History of American Law, 3rd ed., Simon ＆ Schuster Inc. (2005).

Lawrence M. Friedman, The Legal System, Russell Sage Foundation (1987).

Mirjan R. Damaska, The Faces of Justice and State Authority, Yale University Press (1986).“
